entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
